All of the materials from this workshop are freely available. We suggest you work through them in order (see the [Schedule](schedule.qmd) for the order in which materials were presented at the pre-ASTMH workshop).

- Module 3: [Hypothesis testing and power](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/module3_power_interactive/)
- Module 4: [Assuming intra-cluster correlation](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/activity4_multicluster_interactive/)
- Module 5: [The DRpower tool](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/module5_DRpower_interactive/)
- Module 6: [Designing a study for multiple end-points](tutorials/module6/module6_scenarios.Rmd)
